price: “Ntimukanishyire hejuru imbere ya Allah. Rwose mbazaniye ibimenyetso bigaragara.”
arabic: وَأَن لَّا تَعۡلُواْ عَلَى ٱللَّهِۖ إِنِّيٓ ءَاتِيكُم بِسُلۡطَٰنٖ مُّبِينٖ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: wa-an lā taʿlū ʿalā al-lahi innī ātīkum bisul'ṭānin mubīnin
